strollers.name: VISTA V2
strollers.description: The UPPAbaby VISTA V2 Stroller is uniquely designed to adapt as your family grows. luxurious fabrics and full-grain leather details, this premium stroller can transport up to 3 children while strolling like a single. ** Measures: 36 L x 25.7 W x 39.5 **  ** 2-year limited manufacturer's warranty **

strollers.name: Hub Stroller
strollers.description: Super compact and easy to maneuver, the Joolz Hub Stroller is perfect for any busy family on-the-go. Its premium design features 6 ergonomic seat positions to help your baby sit and snooze, while an adjustable hood protects them from the sun. ** Measures 33 L x 21 W x 42 H ** ** 2-year limited manufacturer's warranty **

strollers.name: Adorra Stroller
strollers.description: Versatile, convenient and comfortable, the premium Adorra Stroller from Maxi-Cosi features an enclosed, fully reclined carriage mode for newborn use, plus a stroller mode that allows the seat to be positioned facing forward or facing parents. ** Dimensions (unfolded): 31.5 L x 19.75 W x 38.5 H ** ** 2-year manufacturer's warranty **

strollers.name: Muv Exp 2-1 Stroller Wagon PRO
strollers.description: As practical as it is comfortable the Baby Trend Muv Expedition Double Stroller Wagon PRO transforms from a push stroller to a pull wagon Featuring built-in seating for 2, a large canopy, and a mosquito netting to protect from the elements. ** Dimensions (unfolded): : 41 L x 26 W x 18 H ** ** 2-year manufacturer's warranty **

strollers.name: Xari Aluminum Single Stroller Bundle
strollers.description: Enjoy versatility, innovation, and style with the Mima Xari Aluminum Single Stroller Bundle. This stroller features a carrycot inside system that converts from a stroller to a carrycot, allowing you to comfortably bring your little one anywhere. ** Dimensions (unfolded): : 24 L x 16 W x 35 H ** ** 2-year manufacturer's warranty **

diapers.name: Swaddlers 84-Count Size 0
diapers.description: Super-soft Pampers Swaddlers diapers wrap your baby in plush comfort and provide up to 12 hours of overnight protection. Parents will also appreciate the built-in wetness indicator that changes color to alert when a diaper change may be needed. ** Fits babies < 10 lb.** ** Color-changing wetness indicator makes it easy to tell when baby may need a new diaper **

diapers.name: Special Delivery 32-Count size 0
diapers.description: The Huggies Special Delivery Disposable Diapers are the perfect choice for your baby. Featuring a variety of playful and creative designs. ** For babies 6-9 lb ** ** Hook-and-loop fasteners on the sides **

diapers.name: The Honest Company 32-Count Size 0
diapers.description: New Clean Conscious Diapers are designed with safe, plant-based materials, a wetness indicator, enhanced blowout protection, and advanced absorption for dry. ** Fits babies up to 10 lb ** ** Diaper Duty Wetness Indicator **

diapers.name: bello Size 1 106-Count
diapers.description: These hello bello disposable diapers are great for keeping your precious baby dry. Featuring cute prints, these soft diapers are hypoallergenic, made with a plant-derived absorbent core liner, and have a stretchy fit for your baby's comfort. ** Fits babies up to 10 lb ** ** Diaper Duty Wetness Indicator **

diapers.name: Little Snugglers® Size 1
diapers.description: These hello bello disposable diapers are great for keeping your precious baby dry. Featuring cute prints, these soft diapers are hypoallergenic, made with a plant-derived absorbent core liner, and have a stretchy fit for your baby's comfort. ** Fits babies up to 10 lb ** ** Diaper Duty Wetness Indicator **

formulas.name: Gentlease® 29.1 oz
formulas.description: Enfamil Gentlease Infant Formula is created as a gentle start for sensitive tummies. Designed with easy-to-digest proteins, it is clinically proven to ease fussiness, gas, and crying. ** 29.1 oz. canister **

formulas.name: Pro-Total Comfort™ 29.8 oz.
formulas.description: Feel good knowing Similac Pro-Total Comfort Easy to Digest Infant Formula is designed for fussy little ones with delicate, sensitive tummies. It delivers DHA, Lutein, and Vitamin E essential for brain nourishing, eye health and growth. ** 29.8 oz. powder formula **

formulas.name: Stage 1 Organic Infant Formula
formulas.description: Confidently nourish your little one during their first year of life with Happy Baby's Organic Infant Formula. Modeled after breast milk to meet your baby's changing nutritional needs, this easy-to-digest powdered mix is the perfect feeding companion. ** 21 oz. tub **

formulas.name: PurAmino™ DHA & ARA Infant Formula
formulas.description: The Enfamil PurAmino DHA & ARA Infant Formula is a hypoallergenic infant formula amino acid-based powder with iron. This formula is for infants and toddlers with severe cow's milk protein and multiple food allergies. ** 21 oz. tub **

formulas.name: NeuroPro™ 31.40 oz.  Formula
formulas.description: Enfamil NeuroPro Infant Formula is designed with easy-to-digest proteins for babies through 12 months. Fortified with easy-to-digest proteins and dual prebiotics for immune health. ** 21 oz. tub **
